nodes.text: The Geroon Remnant was the supposed governing body of the Geroon following their apparent abandonment of their homeworld due to being polluted the Vagaari and claimed legitimacy as the Geroon government. In truth however, the Geroon Remnant was a mere military unit of the Vagaari Empire and the Geroon homeworld was already free, having been liberated by the Chiss Ascendancy.

It was supposedly created after the Geroon homeworld had apparently finally gave out after being so polluted by the Vagaari and were forced to abandoned their homeworld, by 22 ABY they said they numbered only 60,000, and could fit into a single 300-meter-long transport. The Geroon Remnant was under the leadership of Steward Bearsh.
In reality, however, the Geroon Remnant was merely a front established by a group of Vagaari in an attempt to help them infiltrate the Chaf Envoy to destroy the Outbound Flight.
